title: The Bloodening
description: Forty years ago, a film appeared that was so shocking, so terrifying, it was sealed in a concrete vault deep beneath the earth. But even the new management at Sony TriStar could not contain the pure evil of The Bloodening!
quote: But you’re the one that’s been bad. You’ve been sneaking puddings.
altHero: four creepy children with white hair and glowing blue eyes
alt1: three dogs growl, showing their teeth
alt2: man screams and runs away from the creepy children
alt3: townspeople have torches and pitchforks as they approach the children
